comments:
I have got this problem in trying to compile one of my projects with M4. The
same code has been correctly compiled with 2.0.2 on windows. I was not able to 
isolate the class that causes the problem, the same source file put in a
different project does not cause problem.
Hope you have enough info to isolate the bug...
